entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure: System.IO.Tests.File_NotifyFilter_Tests.FileSystemWatcher_File_NotifyFilter_Security and System.IO.Tests.Directory_NotifyFilter_Tests.FileSystemWatcher_Directory_NotifyFilter_Attributes #104930
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/Devirtualization/Comparer_get_Default/Comparer_get_Default.dll #104927
    9.0.0
  • Failed test: baseservices/exceptions/regressions/Dev11/154243/dynamicmethodliveness/dynamicmethodliveness.cmd #104924
    9.0.0
  • BinaryFormatter exception in ConfigurationManager when accessing non-existing key #104914
  • Failed to create generic virtual method implementation #104913
  • [API Proposal]: Missing `scoped ref readonly` and `in` reference handling at Unsafe reference #104909
  • [API Proposal]: Add 2D Array Support to GC.AllocateUninitializedArray #104908
  • System.Resources.Extensions.Tests.FormattedObject.BasicObjectTests.BasicObjectsRoundTripAndMatch failure #104905
  • BinSkim not scanning CoreCLR outputs #104901
  • How can a depending class know if IServiceProvider is Scoped, in order to safely resolve a scoped service if available? #104900
  • JIT: Physical promotion bails on signedness mismatch on small types #104898
    9.0.0
  • Encountering runtime errors when running Blazor WebAssembly (WASM) application on Safari iOS 15.4. #104895
  • [6.0/8.0] Assertion failed in WinHttpRequestCallback while Sending Request #104891
    Future
  • Redundant bounds check #104890
    Future
  • [browser][MT] ReleaseJSOwnedObjectByGCHandle: Unexpected synchronous failure #104889
    9.0.0
  • `IPGlobalProperties.DomainName` returns `"(none)"` on Linux #104882
    Future
  • [Apple] Microsoft-Diagnostics-DiagnosticSource EventSource not terminated properly #104881
    9.0.0
  • Accessing constructors with UnsafeAccessor throws exception on generic types in .NET9 #104879
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_45929/test45929/test45929.cmd #104878
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 41 Regressions on 10/18/2023 3:03:02 PM #93926
    9.0.0
  • Incorrect trim analysis warning for base method implementing interface #97676
    9.0.0
  • Upgrade Emscripten SDK for .NET 9 #103977
  • Mutual Authentication: Certificate chain removed when connecting to server in MAUI app but not Xamarin Forms #100602
    9.0.0
  • List.Contains nullable warning #104916
  • LoggerMessage generator fails with primary constructor logger, if the logger is used elsewhere #104801
    9.0.0
  • Incompatibility between ref and lib binary versions for System.Componentmodel.Annotations nuget package #104910
    Future
  • [mono] Reproducible Crash iOS AOT GlobalizationNative_LoadICUData with library mode #97599
  • Finalize Socket API upgrade #33417
    9.0.0
  • iOS test failing with Keychain 'signing-certs.keychain-db' was not found (disabled device) #101502
    9.0.0
  • Named pipes on MacOS can't connect in .NET 8 #101366
  • Trimmer implementation of type hierarchy marking shows order dependent behavior #86580
    9.0.0
  • iOS Release build crashing. #101988
  • Avoid boxing ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull arguments in Tier-0 #104512
    9.0.0
  • Potential perf improvement for Native AOT runtime tests #94102
    9.0.0
  • `System.Net.Security.Tests.TelemetryTest.SuccessfulHandshake_ActivityRecorded` failures in CI #104883
    9.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24321.3] NetTopologySuite launch failed with error: System.PlatformNotSupportedException : BinaryFormatter serialization and deserialization have been removed #103952
    9.0.0
  • [Console]::Beep() does not activate "Bell Notifications" #102211
    Future
  • CI failure for System.Net.Security.Tests.TelemetryTest #104886
  • I just want to ask, in blaozr wasm, why can't we use httpclient to carry the windows identity, but use the browser's featch can and don't need to set up, you don't want us to continue to use wasm, is it? #104854
  • JIT: IV widening does not kick in for simple foreach over `List<int>` #101176
    9.0.0
  • [HttpStress] malloc crashes in HTTP/3 runs #99960
    9.0.0
  • It's possible for handles to not be Dispose()d if AnonymousPipeServerStream.Create throws #103912
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize BOX+UNBOX for "T? -> T" and "T -> T?" #104931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #104929
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `AddRotateComplex`, `MultiplyAddRotateComplex` #104926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #104925
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Replace more Unsafe.SizeOf<T> with sizeof(T) #104923
    area-Meta
  • Use BBF_NO_CSE_IN more widely #104922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix warning for MakeGenericType annotation mismatch #104921
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix alpine-riscv64 build #104920
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #104919
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Mono] Fix the race condition issue of aot_module loading #104918
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.x
  • fix broken Select with error list on macOS #104915
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Fix EH stacktrace keepalive array copy size #104912
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Improve error handling in parallel mode #104907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix name of zlib that the linker needs #104904
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix aot compiler crash when checking for method signature #104903
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Emulate shell exit code behavior for signals in PAL #104902
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • BinaryFormatter bug fix #104896
    area-System.Runtime, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] fix unobserved exceptions #104894
    area-System.Net.Quic

Merged

  • Add support for folding core SIMD operations that produce TYP_MASK on newer hardware #104875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [8.0] Disable for August the OOB packages enabled in July #103597
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Get ThreadContext for AVX registers #104818
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.8
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #104395
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • Use Utf8.IsValid to optimize ManagedWebSocket.TryValidateUtf8 #104865
    area-System.Net
  • Fix trim warnings for base method implementing interface #104753
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid buffer copying in JSON number equality comparison #104850
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #103267
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-codeflow
  • Add Sve.ScatterXBitYNarrowing() on Arm64 #104720
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #104565
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • Fix incorrect reference to compiler-generated field for primary constructor parameter in LoggerMessageGenerator #104899
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • illumos: set default timezone info path #104533
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] use also SslCertificateTrust when constructing CertificateContext #104541
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • [GC] Fix freelist crash - don't modify during check-only operation #104876
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make OpenSSL ENGINE support light up #104810
    area-System.Security
  • Update comment in CreateVersion7 #104897
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Remove `GTF_IS_IN_CSE` #104855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricMultiplyAddCoefficient` #104697
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • ILLink: Fix order dependent logic for DAM on types #104701
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update PackageOverrides.txt #104638
    area-Setup
  • Don't use SyncTextWriter on WASI either #104798
    area-System.IO, os-wasi
  • JIT: Avoid boxing ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull arguments in Tier-0 #104815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Speed up native AOT test build #104880
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] [swift-interop] Add support for reverse pinvoke argument lowering #104437
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Make ActivityRecorder more threadsafe #104888
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Implement `Console.Beep` via bell character instead of Windows API #102685
    area-System.Console, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Dispose handles when inheritabilty is requested and O_CLOEXEC flag can't be set #104196
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Straighten out flow during early jump threading #104603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Prove some cases where strength reducing to GC pointers is ok #104679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in direct P/Invoke returns #104389
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add ee_alloc_context (NativeAOT) #104851
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Set GCStressIncompatible on GenericContext tests #104686
    needs-area-label
  • Adds `SpanSplitEnumerator` #104534
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • cDac work necessary to get the MethodTableName #104759
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2495544 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • fix warnings in coreclr/jit/compiler.cpp for non-Windows targets #104805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Value num refine phis #104752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose the Sin, Cos, and SinCos methods on the Vector types #104848
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #104828
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Caching, 8.0.x
  • Error out when the size of a field is too big #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #104829
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Caching, 6.0.x
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Remove class constraint from Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange #104558
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat version #104838
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [wasi] Remove unused string parameter from mono_wasm_load_runtime #104608
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [cdac] Begin adding MethodDesc APIs to the RuntimeTypeSystem contract #104811
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid duplicate hash table lookups in VN #104873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix superpmi collect failure for crossgen2 on linux x64 and windows x86 #104181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledExceptionsAttribute #104813
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Added Sve.CreateBreakPropagateMask #104704
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Convert Perl scripts to C# in coreclr #104867
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Fix size of dirent buffer on illumos #104448
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [browser] tests and fixes for heap larger than 2GB #104662
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix a potential out-of-bound read in RuntimeInvokeHostAssemblyResolver #104536
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Fix SSP restoring in edge cases #104820
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat version #104837
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Define _REENTRANT for SUNOS #104527
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Remove implicit flush from BufferedStream.WriteByte #104822
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, Future
  • [wasm] Remove "nuget.org" references in WBT #104806
    Security, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
